## Palette
---
### Main colors

| Short name | Hex     | RGB             |
|------------|---------|-----------------|
| Blue       | #0099cc |                 |
| Purple     | #9966cc |                 |
| Orange     | #cc6600 |                 |
| Green      | #999933 |                 |
| Black      | #000000 | (0, 0, 0)       |
